review: Excellent, friendly. I did scaling, fillings, root canal treatment, tooth extraction. I believe this demonstrates the trust from their treatments.
Charged INR 2300 just to re-fix the teeth cap, which got out of the position accidentally. Very high price to do that job. Regret visiting them

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a wonderful experience visiting smile dental. Doctor was very humble and explained the situation in detail. I am very happy and satisfied with the treatment. Thank you doctor.
